company.name: TechCorp Solutions Inc.
company.footer_text: This contract is confidential and legally binding. Please review all terms carefully.

contract.services_description: TechCorp Solutions will provide comprehensive software development services including web application development, database design, and ongoing maintenance and support for the client's e-commerce platform.
service_items: Responsive design and user experience optimization
contract.payment_schedule: 50% upfront, 25% at project midpoint, 25% upon completion
terms_and_conditions: All work will be completed according to the agreed timeline and specifications
Intellectual property rights will transfer to the client upon final payment
Confidentiality of all project information is maintained throughout the contract
Changes to project scope require written approval and may affect pricing
Payment is due within 30 days of invoice date
Late payments may result in suspension of services
Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice
Disputes will be resolved through mediation before legal action
special_clauses: Force majeure clause for unforeseen circumstances
Service level agreement (SLA) with 99.9% uptime guarantee
